0coverTokenSizesName: Token Sizes to not provide cover
noDeadTokenSizes: Token Sizes to not provide cover when at 0hp
halfDeadTokenSizes: Token Sizes to provide 1/2 cover when at 0hp
3/4DeadTokenSizes: Token Sizes to provide 3/4 cover when at 0hp
fullDeadTokenSizes: Token Sizes to provide full cover when at 0hp
CoverSizeHint: Options: tiny, sm, med, lg, huge, grg. Separate with ','; dont use spaces
